titles.title: A bill for the relief of Mrs. Douglas F. Macomber.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Administrative Law and Governmental Relations.

bill.summary: 1/6/1987--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of Defense to pay a specified sum to a named individual as full compensation for the death of her spouse due to actions of the attending medical staff at specified Air Force medical facilities.
